<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// PDBContext</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This data structure is the top level entity that deals with PDB debug</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// information parsing.  This data structure exists only when there is a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// need for a transparent interface to different debug information formats</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (e.g. PDB and DWARF).  More control and power over the debug information</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// access can be had by using the PDB interfaces directly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
